name: Fight aggressive mobs
goal: Survive and neutralize hostile mobs using available gear and terrain
environment: Capture perceived mob types, counts, and positions
Use terrain (water, walls, high ground) to your advantage

steps.title: Assess threat
steps.details: Check which mobs are present, their distance, and if more are arriving. Record nearby blocks for cover or elevation.

steps.title: Fortify position
steps.details: Place quick walls or pillars with any solid blocks. If skeletons present, build side cover; if creepers, maintain distance and avoid tight tunnels.
checks: Two-block-high barrier between you and melee mobs
Line-of-sight broken for ranged mobs where possible

steps.title: Engage safely
steps.details: Kite mobs into choke points. Use shield timing for skeletons; strafe creepers and finish before explosion range; for spiders, fight in open to avoid ceiling pounces.
checks: Health and hunger topped between fights
Collect drops after area is secure

notes: If overwhelmed, pillar three blocks up or retreat to the shelter and wait for daylight.
